questions.question_text: "centralized" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Managed or stored in one main location
questions.example_sentence: The company introduced a centralized system to manage internal documents.
questions.explanation:
一元化された
分散した
一時的に利用不可
外部管理

questions.question_text: "fragmentation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The state of being divided into separate parts
questions.example_sentence: Information fragmentation made it hard for employees to find accurate data.
questions.explanation:
分散・断片化
長期計画
効率向上
承認手続き

questions.question_text: "consolidate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To combine multiple things into one
questions.example_sentence: The new platform helps consolidate documents from different departments.
questions.explanation:
統合する
削除する
延期する
割り当てる

questions.question_text: "designate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To officially choose someone for a role or task
questions.example_sentence: Each department will designate a content owner for document updates.
questions.explanation:
指名する
批判する
資金要請
公開する

questions.question_text: "usability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: How easy something is to use
The cost of maintaining a system
The legal status of a platform
questions.example_sentence: User feedback will be used to improve the system’s usability.
questions.explanation:
使いやすさ
維持費
通信速度
法的地位
